DOC.brief_summary: Volunteers randomly assign gender follow two 12 week experimental period : intervention ( I ) control ( C ) different order ( I/C C/I ) . Both period separate 4 week wash-out interval subject return usual diet : During I period , volunteer weekly consume three 150g/serving Functional Meat ( FM ) product ( cooked Ham Turkey breast ) . It firmly recommend meat meat derivative exclude diet . During C period , volunteer consume identical amount meat product include functional ingredient ( Control Meat ( CM ) ) . Functional meat ( FM ) product ( Functional cook Ham ( FH ) Functional cook Turkey breast ( FT ) ) , manufacture mix meat patent formula® ( P200402755.2004 ) . The amount supercritical rosemary extract , deodorized salmon oil vitamin E use respectively , 0.02 % w/w , 0.6 % w/w , 0.001 % w/w . Control meat ( CM ) product ( Control cook Ham ( CH ) Control cook Turkey ( CT ) , prepare without addition functional ingredient .
DOC.brief_title: Health Benefits Functional Meat ( With n-3 Fatty Acids Rosemary Extract ) Low Risk Cardiovascular Disease People
DOC.detailed_description: The total duration study 28 week : first experimental period 0-12 week , washout period 12-16 week second experimental period 16-28 week :
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 18 year At least 2 lipid profile parameter alter ( TAG ≥150 mg /dl and/or total cholesterol ≥200 mg / dl and/or LDL ≥130 mg / dl and/or HDL ≥40mg/dl men ≥ 50mg/dl woman ) . Signed informed consent Individuals body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 35 kg/m2 Individuals Diabetes Mellitus insulin dependent Individuals disorder associate eat behaviour Individuals consumption omega 3 functional food , fish oil antioxidant supplement Individuals inability consume test food ( ej . Vegetarians ) Individuals special diet due disease celiac disease , chronic renal failure , etc . Individuals mental disease low cognitive function . Individuals consumption drug weight lose . Individuals treat drug whose direct effect lipid profile ( statin , fibrates , diuretic , corticosteroid oral antiinflammatory ) . Individuals disease could involucrate weight lose ( control hypothyroidism , serious psychiatric illness , etc. ) . Pregnant woman lactate . Individuals regular consumption antiinflammatory glucocorticoid .
